column4: I am new to ubuntu, just want to know how I can fix my flash in firefox. WHen trying to play a flash game. the screen "flashes" while im playing. It works, just annoying
do you have Sun java installed?
No just the adobe_flash installer that it prompted me for.
you can fix it simply like this. go to your synaptic package manager
Search Adobe flash
reinstall
synaptic package manager is in System->Administration
I have removed and installed it already. It did not work
then you are missing a plugin for Mozilla
which plugin?
look at the ones you are missing (the ones not in green) and look at the description
thats all i can offer for info on flash
thanks
sorry i could not help more
i can help you get your ubuntu to look like Mac though...
I took out adobe flash and put in adobe nonfreee... the flash app wont load now
the none free is the one you have to pay for...
i think you should revert back to the free one...
I will because neither are working well anyway\
well what version of ubuntu do you have???
http://tinyurl.com/ykwetmu
